availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p: At a county court held at the court house on the 7th day of Aug 1863 Present C L Creekmore Judg It Appearing to the satisfaction of the court that was no election held in district No 2 neather at the May or August Election to elect Justice of the peace it is therefore ordered by the court that Paschel G Bryant and B C Lawson be and they ar here By appointed to fill the office of Justice vacancey acurd by the experation of the turm of office of Wm Siles and Washington Blakley untill the next Regule Election
